definitions.definition: An exclusive focus on a particular area , group , sect , etc.
The principle that only certain people are chosen by God for salvation .
The principle that individual states , races of a federation , etc., may act independently of a central authority .

main_definition: An exclusive focus on a particular area , group , sect , etc.
secondary_definitions: ( Christianity , Judaism , theology ) The principle that only certain people are chosen by God for salvation .
( politics ) The principle that individual states , races of a federation , etc., may act independently of a central authority .
